pullrequest.title: [A-7] Skid steer support for diff drive plugin

content.raw:
I sent the same command to a 2-wheeled vehicle and to a 4-wheeled one and the resulting angular speed looks quite different:

![skid_steer.gif](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8zodKzn/images/2277721242-skid_steer.gif)

The math looks the same as in Gazebo 9's `SkidSteerDrivePlugin` and `gazebo_ros_pkgs`'s `GazeboRosSkidSteerDrive` though.

I just wanted to point this out since a more elaborate implementation should probably take the skidding into account and compensate for it with something like a PID controller.

Approving since this is just migrating an existing  approach.
